name: TheSmith
description:
Welcome to the smith

Your father recently passed away and left you his forge and book to take over the family business.

In the game, you will forge completely custom weapons on a 9 x 9 grid with 11 different materials the goal is to unlock them all.

During the game you will receive orders from customers with the only info their foe you must be able to make the best weapon possible to fight their opponent. The more suited to their opponent the weapon is the more you will be paid.

This game was made with only 16 hours worth of coding for a game jam.
